dc_description_s: Shows portions of Wisconsin, Illinois, Indiana, Ohio, and Ontario. Relief shown by hachures. Title in upper margin: Geographical, statistical, and historical map of Michigan Territory. Text in side panels. Prime meridian: Washington. "No. 36." From A complete historical, chronological, and geographical American atlas ... / H.C. Carey and I. Lea. 1822.: Original version published [Philadelphia] : [Carey & Lea], [1822]; Scale approximately 1:1,900,000
